description: A modern branch of descriptive statistics, data visualization is the creation and study of the visual representation of data. The goal of data visualization is to take a dataset of any size and visually abstract that data in such a way that can we can make any information interpreted from the data almost intuitive for the user to see.

items.title: D3 Data Driven Documents
description: D3 helps you bring data to life using HTML, SVG and CSS. D3â€™s emphasis on web standards gives you the full capabilities of modern browsers without tying yourself to a proprietary framework, combining powerful visualization components and a data-driven approach to DOM manipulation.

articles.title: Why D3js is So Great for Data Visualization

videos.title: Google I/O 2011: Using Google Chart Tools to Create Interactive Dashboards

items.title: Highcharts
description: Highcharts is a charting library written in pure JavaScript, offering an easy way of adding interactive charts to your web site or web application.

items.title: dimple
description: An object-oriented API for business analytics powered by d3.

items.title: sigmajs
description: Sigma is a JavaScript library dedicated to graph drawing. It makes easy to publish networks on Web pages, and allows developers to integrate network exploration in rich Web applications.

items.title: Ember-Charts
description: A beautiful and easily extensible chart suite built with D3.js and Ember.js
